text.p: Leading scores after the first round of the $1.9 million Sarazen World Open on the 6967-yard, par-72 Chateau Elan course (players U.S. unless noted):
68 Craig Stadler, Fred Couples, John Cook, Scott Hoch, Nick Price (Zimbabwe)
69 Paul Broadhurst (Britain), Daniel Chopra (Sweden), Gary Marks (Britain), Mark McNulty (Zimbabwe), Payne Stewart
70 Mark Calcavecchia, Davis Love, Lucas Parsons (Australia), Padraig Harrington (Ireland), Elliot Boult (New Zealand), Steve Kwon, Chad Magee

71 Paul McGinley (Ireland), Barry Lane (Britain), Jack Nicklaus, Jon Robson (Britain), Steve Alker (New Zealand), Michael McLean (Britain), Eduardo Romero (Argentina), Chris Williams (Britain), P.J. Cowan
